City Year London Newsletter
Applications now open
City Year is a leading youth and education charity working in London and from 2013 in Birmingham. We aim to tackle two of the biggest social welfare issues in the UK: educational under-attainment in disadvantaged communities and youth unemployment. Our goal is to achieve a 'double' impact through making a difference in the lives of both our volunteers and the communities they serve.
We are the only coordinated opportunity for full time volunteering within English schools. No other movement for social change offers young people the chance to volunteer full time for a whole year in inner city schools. Have you got what it takes to make a difference?
Who We look For
We look for people that demonstrate these qualities: passion, idealism, energy, commitment, dedication, tirelessness, optimism, hope, selflessness, pride, leadership, focus, ambition.
What You'll Do
Working in a team with your peers, you will become a role model for children and young people. You'll also focus on developing skills that will improve your employability beyond City Year.
What You'll Get
Get your expenses paid whilst volunteering. Meet new friends and be introduced to professional networks through our Leadership after City Year programme
Apply Now
Complete and send us your application today. If shortlisted you will be invited to interview at our offices.
